Last Updated: 9th April 2025

 Welcome to our Geocaching application! We take your privacy seriously. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully before using our services.


1. Information We Collect
 When you register an account, we collect:
 • Your email address
 • Your username
 • Your password (stored securely using encryption)


2. How We Use Your Information
 The information we collect is used for:
 • Creating and managing your Geocaching account
 • Providing personalized services
 • Improving application features and functionality
 • Sending important notifications and updates


3. Data Security
 We implement appropriate security measures including:
 • SSL encryption for data transmission
 • Password hashing for storage
 • Regular security audits


4. Information Sharing
 We are committed to:
 • Never selling your personal information
 • Only disclosing information when legally required


5. Your Rights
 You have the right to:
 • Access your account information
 • Modify your personal details
 • Delete your account


6. Policy Changes
 We may update this policy periodically. Significant changes will be:
 • Notified through in-app announcements
 • Marked with a new "Last Updated" date


By continuing with registration, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to all terms of this Privacy Policy.
